dialogues.content: Hello Stranger! What brings you here!

choices.content: Hi there, would you know where I can find the golden globe?
Hi there, are you from here, Im kind of lost?

dialogues.content: yes, I have been living here for decades, what bring you here

choices.content: I am looking for teh golden globe

dialogues.content: The Golden globe, yes; it is in the yellow house!

choices.content: Brilliant, would you also know about where to find the yellow house

dialogues.content: Of course, this house is about 100 meters north from here!
